travels.name: Rocky Mountains Exploration
travels.description: A 7-day journey exploring the natural beauty of the Rocky Mountains, with activities including hiking, camping, and wildlife observation.

travels.name: Amazon Jungle Adventure
travels.description: Dive into the heart of the Amazon in this 10-day trip. Discover its unique biodiversity with expert local guides.

travels.name: Greek Islands Discovery
travels.description: Explore the most enchanting Greek islands on a 14-day voyage. Enjoy the culture, beaches, and Mediterranean cuisine.

travels.name: Urban Exploration in Tokyo
travels.description: Experience the vibrant urban life of Tokyo on this 7-day trip. Discover its rich history, cutting-edge technology, and delicious street food.

travels.name: African Savannah Safari
travels.description: Experience an exhilarating 10-day safari in the African savannah. Get up close with wildlife in their natural habitat.
